text: Uss waqt ko yaad kero jab kay Allah tum per oongh taari ker raha tha apni taraf say chain denay kay liye aur tum per aasman say pani barsa raha tha kay iss pani kay zariye say tum ko pak ker dey aur tum say shetani waswasay ko dafa kerdey aur tumharay dilon ko mazboot kerdey aur tumharay paon jama dey
